meanings.definition: Giving off or reflecting bright, flickering light
meanings.sent1: The stars in the night sky looked sparklier than usual.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was sparklier than all the others at the party.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball was so sparklier that it made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The sparklier jewels on the crown shone like tiny suns.
meanings.sent5: The sparklier fireworks lit up the sky in a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: More brightly shining or glistening than something else
meanings.sent1: The sun was sparklier today than yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The dew on the grass looked sparklier in the morning light.
meanings.sent3: The sparklier diamond outshone all the others in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were sparklier than the brightest gemstones.
meanings.sent5: The sparklier snowflakes glistened in the winter sun.
